description: Number of equivalence classes of Boolean functions of n variables under action of M(n,2).
comments: Group M(n,2) is semi-direct product of LSD(n,2) (Cf. A028407) and complementing group C(n,2).
references: V. Jovovic, The cycle index polynomials of some classical groups, Belgrade, 1995, unpublished.
I. Strazdins, Universal affine classification of Boolean functions, Acta Applic. Math. 46 (1997), 147-167.
links: Index entries for sequences related to Boolean functions
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
